dcterms:creator: Hao Wang
Hao He
Dina Katabi
dcterms:description: This dataset is a variant of the classic 2-entangled moons dataset, where the lower and upper moon-shaped clusters are labeled 0 and 1, and each contains 500 instances. The continuous concept drift is represented by the progressive positional changes of the moon-shaped clusters.
dcterms:title: Rotated 2-Moons

dcterms:creator: Li Deng
dcterms:description: This dataset is a variant of the classic MNIST dataset, comprising images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9. The continuous concept drift means the rotation of the images.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:creator: Liang Zhao
Qian Sun
Jieping Ye
Feng Chen
Chang-Tien Lu
Naren Ramakrishnan
dcterms:description: The Influenza dataset utilizes tweets data to predict flu intensity. The continuous concept drift in this dataset is characterized by the fluctuations in tweet volumes over the years and the variation in flu activity throughout the season.
dcterms:title: Influenza

dcterms:creator: Huaxiu Yao
Caroline Choi
Bochuan Cao
Yoonho Lee
Pang Wei W Koh
Chelsea Finn
dcterms:description: The Yearbook dataset consists of frontal-facing yearbook portraits collected between 1930 and 2013 from 128 American high schools. This dataset provides a visual record of evolving fashion styles and social norms across the decades.
dcterms:title: Yearbook

dcterms:creator: Boyo Chen
Buo-Fu Chen
Hsuan-Tien Lin
dcterms:description: The Cyclone dataset is collected through satellite remote sensing and is designed for the task of tropical cyclone image to wind intensity estimation. The variation in wind strength associated with the seasonal dates results in a continuous concept drift.
dcterms:title: Cyclone

dcterms:creator: Boyo Chen
Buo-Fu Chen
Hsuan-Tien Lin
dcterms:description: The House dataset comprises housing price data from 2013 to 2019 and is utilized for a regression task to predict the price of a house given the features. The concept drift in this dataset is how the housing price changes over time for a certain region.
dcterms:title: House
